DataElementConcept.preferredName: Slide Device Component And Image Processing Additional Pathology Research Resource Center Comment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A flat rectangular piece of glass on which specimens can be mounted for microscopic study._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic._The act of preparing or putting through a prescribed procedure._Added; extra; further._The medical science, and specialty practice, concerned with all aspects of disease, but with special reference to the essential nature, causes, and development of abnormal conditions, as well as the structural and functional changes that result from the disease processes. Informally used to mean the result of such an examination._The funding, research facilities, and materials available for research_A point or area that is approximately central within some larger region or structure._A written explanation, observation or criticism added to textual material.
